column4: has anyone tried to install skype 1.4 in dapper drake? i can't get libasound to satisfy the version requirement needed for the deb package
is pidgin not in the repositories for 6.06LTS?
LTS means long term support darnit!
are the deb packages for it?
well i am pretty partial to gaim but apparently pidgin supports direct connections with windows
i was able to find this though: http://drsjlazar.blogspot.com/2007/05/pidgin-for-dapper.html
you know that cool feature that lets you drag images into the chat
gaim has basically all the functionality that pidin does.
it hasn't for a really long time
not the gaim i have anyway
1.5.1 doesn't support direct connections to windows computers
